name: Trianguloids
description:
Play as a collection of triangles, where your only ability to move is through shooting one of four sets of cannons at a time. Explore a procedurally generated world and configure your ship for maximum maneuverability! If you get a highscore, please leave a comment. Current: 3250

If this isn't out of control, I don't know what is.

Use the FGHJ keys (center four on a standard keyboard) to fire your cannons, or follow the in-game tutorial.

Known Bugs:

 - Player rotates about a weird axis

- Occasionally can be trapped inside a wall

 - Spawning sometimes fails for no reason
